data_dependency: Is variable 'res (line 3)' used after its definition?
Does the value assigned to 'p (line 4)' affect subsequent computations?
liveness: Does variable 'c (line 5)' remain in use at the end of function 'add_one'?
Is variable 'k' live at the end of function 'countAndSay'?
